sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AjaxUserRateTypeSetting</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AjaxUserRateTypeSetting</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AjaxUserRateTypeSetting = Class.create();
AjaxUserRateTypeSetting.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getUserRateTypeSetting : function(){
		var result = this.newItem("result");
		var userId = this.getParameter("sysparm_user_id");
		if(gs.nil(userId) || userId == ""){
			if(this.getParameter("sysparm_time_card_id"))
				userId = this._getUserIdFromTimeCard(this.getParameter("sysparm_time_card_id"));
			else
				userId = gs.getUserID();
		}
		var isMultipleRateTypesAllowed = false;
		var isUserValid = JSUtil.notNil(userId);
		var defaultRatetype = "";
		if(isUserValid){
			var tsp = TimeSheetPolicy.getFromUserId(userId);
			isMultipleRateTypesAllowed = tsp.allowMultipleRatetypes();
			if(isMultipleRateTypesAllowed)
				defaultRatetype =  tsp.defaultRateType();
		}
		result.setAttribute('isUserAllowedForMultipleRateType', isMultipleRateTypesAllowed);
		result.setAttribute('defaultRatetype', defaultRatetype);
		return isMultipleRateTypesAllowed;
	},
	
	_getUserIdFromTimeCard: function(timeCardId) {
		var timeCard = new GlideRecord('time_card');
		timeCard.get(timeCardId);
		return timeCard.getValue('user');
	},
	
    type: 'AjaxUserRateTypeSetting'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-05-15 13:39:00</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>131ad57cc7723200a56442808e9763ff</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AjaxUserRateTypeSetting</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Time Card Management" source="com.snc.time_card">3bef86e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d4343</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_131ad57cc7723200a56442808e9763ff</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-01-07 07:09:10</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
